get.description: This API fetches details of an channel.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the channel. Allowed values are @preference@, @creator@

schema.description: Additional information related to the channel. Allowed values are @preference@, @creator@

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the channels.If passed in the param, then these values will be appended in the channel response. Allowed values are @preference@,@creator@,@meta@,@configParams@

schema.description: Additional information related to the channels.If passed in the param, then these values will be appended in the channel response. Allowed values are @preference@,@creator@,@meta@,@configParams@

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Department Id for which channels to be fetched

schema.description: Department Id for which channels to be fetched

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Department Id for which channels to be fetched
Set this to fetch only the active channels
Set this to fetch sandbox channels only.
Business Hour Id to be Configured.
Time in seconds for idle time of the session
Specify whether ticket has to be converted automatically after idle time
Default bot id of the channel

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the conversations must be fetched

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the conversations must be fetched

departmentId.description: Default department id for the channel tickets

businessHourId.description: Business Hour Id to be Configured.

autoTicketConvertInterval.description: Time in seconds for idle time of the session

autoTicketConvert.description: Specify whether ticket has to be converted automatically after idle time

departmentId.description: Department ID to which the channel is associated
